sourcesContent:
import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { FiX } from "react-icons/fi"; import Button from "./reusable/Button"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; const HireMeModal = ({ onClose, onRequest }) => { const [user, setUser] = useState({}); const datahandle = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.id]: e.target.value }); }; const submithandle = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const { data } = await axios.post( "https://itgiants.onrender.com/api/v1/contact", user ); alert(data.message); ; }; return ( {/* Modal Backdrop */}
{/* Modal Content */}
Are You Crurious About ?
